Package com.mesosphere.mesos.rx.java.protobuf

This package provides a builder and corresponding MessageCodecs necessary to create a client (using protobuf) to interact with an Observable of Protos.Event coming from Apache Mesos.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProtoCodec.ByteArrayParser<R>
    Mandatory functional interface definition due to protobuf parsing methods throwing InvalidProtocolBufferException, a checked exception.
    ProtoCodec.InputStreamParser<R>
    Mandatory functional interface definition due to protobuf parsing methods throwing a checked exception.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProtobufMesosClientBuilder
    A collection of methods that have some pre-defined MesosClientBuilder configurations.
    ProtobufMessageCodecs
    A pair of MessageCodecs for Protos.Call and Protos.Event
    ProtoCodec<T extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    Implements MessageCodec for Protocol Buffers.
    ProtoUtils
    A set of utility methods that make working with Mesos Protos easier.
    SchedulerCalls
    A set of factory methods that make Calls easier to create.
    SchedulerEvents
    A set of factory methods that make Events easier to create.

Package com.mesosphere.mesos.rx.java.protobuf Description

This package provides a builder and corresponding MessageCodecs necessary to create a client (using protobuf) to interact with an Observable of Protos.Event coming from Apache Mesos. The following is a full Apache Mesos Framework that declines all resource offers: 

 import static org.apache.mesos.v1.Protos.*;
 import static org.apache.mesos.v1.scheduler.Protos.*;

 final Protos.FrameworkID fwId = FrameworkID.newBuilder().setValue(UUID.randomUUID().toString()).build();
 com.mesosphere.mesos.rx.java.ProtobufMesosClientBuilder.schedulerUsingProtos()
     .mesosUri(URI.create("http://localhost:5050/api/v1/scheduler"))
     .applicationUserAgentEntry(UserAgentEntries.literal("decline-framework", "0.1.0-SNAPSHOT"))
     .subscribe(
         Call.newBuilder()
             .setFrameworkId(fwId)
             .setType(Call.Type.SUBSCRIBE)
             .setSubscribe(
                 Call.Subscribe.newBuilder()
                     .setFrameworkInfo(
                         Protos.FrameworkInfo.newBuilder()
                             .setId(fwId)
                             .setUser("root")
                             .setName("decline-framework")
                             .setFailoverTimeout(0)
                     )
             )
             .build()
     )
     .processStream(es ->
         es.filter(event -> event.getType() == Event.Type.OFFERS)
         .flatMap(event -> Observable.from(event.getOffers().getOffersList()))
         .map(offer ->
             Call.newBuilder()
                 .setFrameworkId(fwId)
                 .setType(Call.Type.DECLINE)
                 .setDecline(
                     Call.Decline.newBuilder()
                         .addOfferIds(offer.getId())
                 )
                 .build()
         )
         .map(SinkOperations::create)
         .map(Optional::of)
     )
     .build()
     .openStream()
     .await();
